- Up (5, 5) has `#` (crate)

Since moving in any direction will lead to a crate, which will not be immediately helpful for progressing towards the exit, I should consider moving down to see if it provides new options. 

I'll take the action to move down to (7, 5).

``` Action:3 ``` 

This action will shift my position downwards, allowing me to explore the area that may also help in collecting chips or moving towards the exit.
